Detailed Description

A generalised, simple, singleton application class containing logging and event managment.

Singleton pattern taken from post on Stackoverflow.com by "modi" http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42558/python-and-the-singleton-pattern/1810367#1810367 Accessed: 9th March 2010
